sec_major_upgrades.name: SEC: Major Upgrades
sec_major_upgrades.desc: Upgrades from top-tier banks (Goldman, JPM, etc.)

summary.markdown:
# SEC Filing Signal Lab — Results Summary

Dataset: 166 SEC filings, 40 companies
, 2023-12-15 to 2025-09-15


## Strongest Individual Features

- **sec_sentiment_score**: IC=nan, accuracy=42.2%, p=nan
- **sec_forward_pe**: IC=0.252, accuracy=41.0%, p=0.001
- **sec_analyst_coverage**: IC=0.244, accuracy=59.0%, p=0.002
- **sec_market_cap**: IC=0.216, accuracy=56.6%, p=0.005
- **sec_pe_ratio**: IC=0.208, accuracy=43.4%, p=0.007
- **nlp_guidance_revision_dir**: IC=0.208, accuracy=61.5%, p=0.007
- **sec_analyst_consensus_score**: IC=0.176, accuracy=56.0%, p=0.023
- **nlp_mgmt_specificity**: IC=0.173, accuracy=56.0%, p=0.025

## Best Model by Horizon

- **7D**: Stepwise+Ridge (CV R²=0.0307)
- **30D**: Stepwise+Ridge (CV R²=-0.0626)
- **7D_alpha**: Stepwise+Ridge (CV R²=0.0574)
- **30D_alpha**: Stepwise+Ridge (CV R²=-0.0111)
